content: Set terminal title for implementation work
META: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create ShutdownResult enum with variants: CleanShutdown, ProcessKilled{pid}, NotRunning, Error{message}
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding ShutdownResult enum
Create build_shutdown_response function that converts ShutdownResult to JSON response
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding build_shutdown_response
Create shutdown_app async function that returns ShutdownResult
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding shutdown_app
Update handle_shutdown to use new functions and remove fallback_to_process_kill
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating handle_shutdown
Run cargo clippy with strict settings and fix any issues
Run cargo nextest run and review any test failures
Task subagent to do code review focusing on duplication and complexity
Review code review findings with user
